name: Little Messenger
description:
Little Messenger is a 2D platformer multiplayer game. This game is develop by using Unity. The story in this game is about the player act as the little messenger who have to deliver the letter to little girl's grandma who already pass away. then the little messenger start the journey. In this game, both players have to work together to pass the level. This game is focus on encourage communication between the players.

This game is a 2 players game. To pass the levels, 2 players need to work together. Internet is required to play this game.

Kindly give me feedback after playing this game. Thank you!
